TopicTitle: Let's Play Kerbal Space Program with Hucking

Articles.Content:
The following will be a series containing tutorial for new-ish players to the game. If you've bought the game and have gotten around the simple concepts of getting into orbit and building a simple rocket, tune in to find out how to do more complex maneuvers, getting to the mun, landing, and returning, rendezvousing and docking, getting to minmus, doing interplanetary science, and of course, THE MODS!

Here is a link to my youtube channel: http://www.youtube.com/huckinglp

And here is a link to the playlist of the videos:

And now here are the episodes, embedded for your convenience:
